column16: Kin is a new way to get rewarded for your ideas and creativity. In the Kin Marketplace you easily earn Kin by completing quick tasks and spend it on your favorite brands.
The Kin Marketplace is the central hub for all things Kin. Find all of the latest spend/earn opportunities and keep track of your balance in your very own super secure blockchain wallet.
Earning Kin is fast and fun. Just complete quick tasks like answering short surveys, watching a video, or reading a tutorial (like this one) to see your Kin start rolling in.
